description.value:
Psychic

Aura 10; when any enemy within the aura makes a death saving throw, each conscious enemy within the aura takes 10 psychic damage.

Aura 10; when any enemy within the aura makes a saving throw against ongoing damage, that enemy is weakened until the end of its next turn. Enemies within the aura can choose not to make saving throws against ongoing damage to avoid this effect.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Fire, Weapon

Standard

Reach 2

+39 vs AC; 3d12 damage, and ongoing 5 fire damage (save ends).

At-Will ✦ Weapon

Minor 1/Round, At-Will

Reach 2

Targets a creature that is not bloodied; +39 vs AC; 3d10 damage, and ongoing 5 damage (save ends).

CharmPsychic

Minor, Recharges When No Creature Is Affected By This Power

Ranged 20

Trigger: When no creature is affected by this power

Targets an enemy taking ongoing damage; +39 vs Will; each time Torog takes damage, the target takes psychic damage equal to one-half the damage dealt to Torog. Each time the target takes damage from this effect, it can use an immediate reaction to end the effect by voluntarily becoming dominated by Torog (save ends).

system.rechargeCondition: When No Creature Is Affected By This Power

description.value:
At-Will

Standard

Close burst 20

Targets one, two, or three enemies; +37 vs Reflex; 1d10+10 damage, and the target slides 5 squares and is restrained until the end of Torog's next turn.

At-Will

Immediate Reaction

Close burst 20

Trigger: When torog is hit by an attack, at-will

Targets the triggering attacker; +37 vs Reflex; 1d10+10 damage, and the target is stunned until the end of Torog's next turn.

At-Will

Move

Torog moves his speed or shifts 1 square, and a crawling blood swarm (see the statistics block) appears in a square he left.

Encounter

Trigger: When first bloodied

When Torog becomes bloodied, he normally discorporates and is unable to take physical form for a time.
Torog cannot be knocked prone. He takes no penalties for his ruined legs, and crawls at his normal speed.

system.biography:
HP 1232; Bloodied 616 ; see also discorporation
Resist 20 psychic Immune attacks by characters below 20th level 		Init +26 | AP 2 | Save +5; whenever an attack applies an effect to Torog that a save can end, he immediately makes a saving throw. Torog also makes saving throws at the end of each of his turns as normal.
AC 48Fort 47Ref 45Will 46
Speed 6 (earth walk), climb 6
Ability ScoresStr 33 (+28)
Con 28 (+26)		Dex 20 (+22)
Int 28 (+26)		Wis 30 (+27)
Cha 27 (+25)
Languages all, telepathy 20
Alignment Evil
Skills Dungeoneering +32, Endurance +31, Intimidate +35Senses Darkvision
Passive Perception 37 | Insight 37

Equipment serrated longsword, sickle of agony
